header_text: Building model cars has been a hobby of yours since you were young. You start a new model and find it hard to follow the instructions and place the pieces correctly. In the end, you work very slowly, and the final model is perfect.

elements.Text: Are you able to successfully build the model?

elements.name: Building model cars has been a hobby of yours since you were young. You start a new model and find it hard to follow the instructions and place the pieces correctly. In the end, you work very slowly, and the final model is perfect._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
